description.narrative: - Supply Chain: Strengthening the competitiveness of one of a leading automotive parts and components producers and its supply chain in the Mexico, will result in corresponding impacts on technical upgrading of its local supply chain, production volumes and economy-wide linkages. - Sustainable employment: The Project will generate 899 skilled direct jobs across the CIE's 9 manufacturing plants in the country in addition to several indirect jobs in the Group's suppliers who will also be increasing capacity and upgrading skills to meet the higher volume requirements. - Customers: End consumers, predominantly OEMs and Tier 1 companies operating in Mexico, will benefit from better access to a reliable source of good quality locally produced components and parts for their operations, which ultimately helps with sustaining the competitiveness of the automotive cluster in the country which will depend less on imported parts. - Market: Stronger integration of local suppliers into the domestic and global value chains through the improvement of standards and capacity.

mailing-address.narrative: CIE Automotive S.A. María Muruaga Corporate Finance +34 946 21 72 10 mmuruaga@cieautomotive.com Parque Empresarial Boroa48940 Boroa. Amorebieta www.cieautomotive.com
